# 1. Load Packages
```{r}
library(brms)
library(marginaleffects)
library(tidyverse)

options(scipen = 999)

set.seed(180822)

set_priors <- c(prior(normal(0, 1), class = b),
                prior(normal(0, 1), class = sd))
```

# 2. Load Data
```{r}
#MA
load("cccu_R1.RData")

load("cccu_R2.RData")

load("cccu_R3.RData")

```


```{r}
cccu_R1 <- cccu_R1 %>%
  arrange(CASEID) %>%
  mutate_if(is.factor, droplevels)

cccu_R1_hc_only <- cccu_R1 %>%
  filter(hc == "hc") %>%
  mutate_if(is.factor, droplevels)

cccu_R1_nonhc_only <- cccu_R1 %>%
  filter(hc == "non_hc") %>%
  mutate_if(is.factor, droplevels)

cccu_R2 <- cccu_R2 %>%
  arrange(CASEID) %>%
  mutate_if(is.factor, droplevels)

cccu_R2_hc_only <- cccu_R2 %>%
  filter(hc == "hc") %>%
  mutate_if(is.factor, droplevels)

cccu_R2_nonhc_only <- cccu_R2 %>%
  filter(hc == "non_hc") %>%
  mutate_if(is.factor, droplevels)

cccu_R3 <- cccu_R3 %>%
  arrange(CASEID) %>%
  mutate_if(is.factor, droplevels)

cccu_R3_hc_only <- cccu_R3 %>%
  filter(hc == "hc") %>%
  mutate_if(is.factor, droplevels)

cccu_R3_nonhc_only <- cccu_R3 %>%
  filter(hc == "non_hc") %>%
  mutate_if(is.factor, droplevels)
```

# 4. Average marginal effects for models in main analyses for robustness analyses

## Model1
### R1
```{r}

#average marginal effect
ame <- marginaleffects(R1_ma_1)
summary(ame, conf_level = .997)


```

### R2
```{r}
#average marginal effect
ame <- marginaleffects(R2_ma_1)
summary(ame, conf_level = .997)


```

### R3
```{r}

summary(ame, conf_level = .997)


```
